about_me.des: Hi, my name is Cheng Gu. I love 3D game programming, and have a strong passion of learning Computer Graphics!

career.college_des: At September 2016,I went to Woodbury University majoring Applied Computer Science, and started my IT career.
career.companyA: Math & Science Tutoring Center in Woodbury University
career.companyA_des: At October 2017,I got my first on-campus job, which is tutoring student in the Math and other Science Subjects at Woodbuty University Tutoring Center.
